name: 360-days-of-non-vibe-code-challenge
description: The 360 Days of NON-VIBE-CODE-CHALLENGE is a rigorous, year-long self-improvement program designed to transform a developer from a "Framework User" to a "Framework Architect". The challenge runs from November 18, 2025, to November 18, 2026, requiring 1 to 1.5 hours of deep work daily.
